title: Directx error after champ select is linked to a out gmae problem?
body:
I get the DirectX error after the champ select but i'm also getting a out game problem, whenever i do anything my screen seems choppy and lagging, ex. is when i open up chrome it loads up top to bottom and whenever i scroll it lags.
This problem has been going on for 5 days and the support are taking their time with this, I'm just here to ask if anyone has or had this problem like me  and got any advice 
It's getting annoying not being able to a great game like this

replies.body: It sounds like your computer is having trouble rendering the game files properly, which could be due to a few reasons.  We have a [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) guide that can help rule out some factors, like corrupt game files or outdated graphics drivers.  Hopefully, this will get you all fixed up for good, but let me know if you have any issues.

There is a directX section [HERE](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq3) that might help you, perhaps looking at these directions and following the steps it could DIRECT you to the solution, if it doesn't work make sure to let me know and we can continue to work on getting it fixed.
